Class Key

public class Key
extends Item

A key is an item that is used on an activator.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ian Froning

Constructor Detail

Key

public Key()
Constructs a key item with the default name and description.

Key

public Key(java.lang.String aName,
           java.lang.String aDescription)
Constructs a key item with a given name and description.

Parameters:
aName - the key name - the name the player gives when they want to interact with the key
aDescription - the key description - the text displayed when the player enters the room that contains the key or looks in their inventory
Method Detail

useKey

Uses the key.

Parameters:
activator - the activator the key is used on
